name: 3D viewer – Embed 3D Models on WordPress
author: bPlugins

sections.description:
👉 Plugin Demo | Documentation | Get Pro Version 👈

3D Viewer is a 3D model embedder plugin that lets you display your 3D models beautifully on your website. This plugin supports a variety of 3D model files such as .glb, .gltf, and so on. The plugin is very easy to use and anyone can use the plugin easily without any technical knowledge.
Embed any 3D files in Posts, Page and Widget areas and WooCommerce product page. It comes with everything you need to make the most of your 3D models.

3D Viewer is a powerful and user-friendly plugin that lets you display 3D models on your WordPress website. Whether you’re a designer, developer, or simply want to showcase 3D content, this plugin makes it easy to embed interactive 3D models in your posts, pages, and products.

With 3D Viewer, you can upload your 3D models in various file formats, including OBJ, STL, and GLB, and customize their appearance with a range of settings, such as lighting, background color, and camera controls. You can also choose from different viewing modes, including orbit, pan, and zoom, to give your users the best possible 3D viewing experience.

The plugin includes an intuitive shortcode generator that simplifies the process of adding 3D models to your website. Simply select the model you want to display, customize the settings to your liking, and the plugin will generate the shortcode for you.

3D Viewer is optimized for mobile devices and supports touch controls, making it easy for your users to interact with your 3D content on their smartphones and tablets. The plugin is also compatible with WooCommerce, allowing you to showcase 3D models of your products in a stunning and engaging way.

Overall, 3D Viewer is a versatile and powerful plugin that can help you showcase 3D content on your WordPress website with ease. Try it out today and bring your 3D models to life!

Features

3D Viewer Plugin for WordPress offers you a complete solution for displaying any 3D objects that will amaze your visitors.

  • WooCommerce : 3D Viewer plugin extends the WooCommerce functionality. It enable you to Embed 3D models of your products in the product page.
  • 3D Gallery: Do you have varients of a products and have separate 3D models of each varient? No worries, you can add multiple 3D models and embed them as a gallery in the product page to attract the customers.
  • Lightweight: A single JavaScript library is used that makes the embedder very Lightweight.
  • Multiple Source: It supports external links of the 3d files, also you can store the 3d model file in the WordPress media library.
  • Preset: Preset settings saves you a lot of time, you can save your preference of the viewer options that helps you embed more in less time.
  • Elementor: Its works great with elementor page builder (Elementor 3D viewer)
  • User friendly interface: This plugin come up with a clean and easy to use interface which gives you an excellent experience.
  • ShortCode: The ShortCode API enabled you to embed the model anywhere in the site.
  • Auto Rotation: Auto Rotation option gives you the 360 degree viewing experience without interaction.
  • Touch : Interact with the models with touch screen enabled devices.
  • Zoom: Zoom in, zoom out with mouse scroll or touch.
  • Lazy Loading: Improve User Experience, reduce loading time, and get ranked with Search Engine.

How to use ?

Here is a quick Video tutorial.

Usage

To embed 3D Models in Post, Page or Widget area you have to generate a ShortCode first. To generate a ShortCode follow the steps below.

  1. Go to -> 3D Viewer from Dashboard menu -> Add New.
  2. Configure the viewer according to your preferences.
  3. Click the Save button
  4. Copy the Generated ShortCode form that screen and Paste it in a ShortCode block within any post, page, or widgets.

How to embed 3D Model in WooCommerce product page?

If you have a 3D models of your products and you want to embed the model in WooCommerce product page you can do that using this plugin. You can embed the 3D model of the product by following the steps below.

  • Install 3D Viewer Plugin
  • Install WooCommerce Plugin
  • Go to Products from WordPress dashboard (WooCommerce Products)
  • Add New products or edit any existing Product.
  • Scroll down to get the Metabox titled “3D Viewer Settings”
  • Add the 3D model or paste the model url.
  • Publish the product.
  • Now visit the product page to see the embeded model.

⭐ Checkout our other WordPress Plugins-

🔥 Html5 Audio Player – Best audio player plugin for WordPress.

🔥 Html5 Video Player – Best video player plugin for WordPress.

🔥 PDF Poster – A fully-featured PDF Viewer Plugin for WordPresss.

🔥 StreamCast – A fully-featured Radio Player Plugin for WordPresss.

🔥 3D Viewer – Display interactive 3D models on the webs.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcode in page, post or in widgets.
  4. If you want player in your theme php, Place <?php echo do_shortcode('YOUR_SHORTCODE'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
Which 3D files currently this plugin support?

Currently this plugin support .glb, .gltf files.

Can I use this plugin with Elementor page builder ?

Yes, you can paste the shortCode of 3D Viewer and paste it inside Elementor’s Shortcode elements.

I have a .fbx file, can I embed that file using the 3D Viewer Plugin?

Yes, this plugin supports glb, gltf, 3dm, 3ds, 3mf, amf, bim, brep, dae, fbx, fcstd, ifc, iges, step, stl, obj, off, ply, wrl file.

How can I reach you, if I need any modification, customization or helps?

Please follow this link to reach us directly

sections.reviews:
Fantastic

By blunoa on December 1, 2023

Fantastic plugin the main feature that i like is the 3D model is perfectly loaded and you can adjust the light, am using the PRO version.

Tks so much, I hope the plugin will support adding fbx files in the future

By ntd1996 on July 6, 2023

i love this plugin, but I hope the plugin will support adding fbx files in the future, tk so much <3

Excellent plugin , simple depuis l'install jusqu'à la publication des 3D...

By jcljcl75 on June 13, 2023

Excellent plugin même en version gratuite, simple depuis l'installation jusqu'à la publication des 3D, en fait tout se fait tout seul ou presque !

Works like a charm

By Andik76 on November 29, 2022

Thanks, great Plugin. I never successfully embedded a 3d model before because of file size issues. I tried some other plugins but this one came out on top. Converted the .stl file to .glb for optimal file size. Easy interface, just upload your file and paste the shortcode anywhere. Saved my day - Thanks guys!

Amazingly Useful Plugin

By markchang2006 on April 30, 2022

Excellent and super easy! Thanks for the team who develop this plugin!

Poor support in paid version

By abkhere on February 16, 2022

The author provides zero support when paid for membership and its paid version is useless. zero support and zero performance. If free version does the job it's good, don't buy it's crap. You won't get any significant reply.

It does what I hoped for

By AkaijaWim on January 24, 2022

Having had experiences with some other 3D viewers this one was remarkably easy to install and use. I use a multilingual website with WPML and Woocommerce and so far all works well. I didn't check for WPML specific support yet though. I upload GTLF Blender made files. First impressions is very positive.

Simples e objetivo

By Gabriel Soares (neobiel) on January 16, 2022

Era exatamente o que eu queria para 3D no Wordpress. Estava estudando e quebrando a cabeça para fazer isso manual, mas esse plugin faz exatamente o que eu queria. O primeiro que eu daria meu dinheiro com gosto para poder ter atualizações e mais recursos.

Good Work.

By dartista on October 10, 2021

Needs panning features but works well.

PERFECTO...!!!

By Mugam (mugam) on September 27, 2021

Wow, buenísimo, intuitivo y fácil de implementar. Mis felicitaciones y en cuanto saque tiempo os lo traduzco al español. Os lo merecéis por tan buen trabajo. ¡¡¡ GRACIAS !!!

short_description: Easily display 3D models on the web. Visualize your .glb, .gltf, .dae, .fbx, .step, .stl, .obj, and more.
